parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Seed for different images and reproducibility. Use -1 to randomise seed

parameters.description: Seed for different images and reproducibility. Use -1 to randomise seed

parameters.name: width

param_schema.title: Width
param_schema.description: Width of generated video in pixels, must be divisable by 8

parameters.description: Width of generated video in pixels, must be divisable by 8

parameters.name: frames

param_schema.title: Frames
param_schema.description: Length of the video in frames (playback is at 8 fps e.g. 16 frames @ 8 fps is 2 seconds)

parameters.description: Length of the video in frames (playback is at 8 fps e.g. 16 frames @ 8 fps is 2 seconds)

parameters.name: height

param_schema.title: Height
param_schema.description: Height of generated video in pixels, must be divisable by 8

parameters.description: Height of generated video in pixels, must be divisable by 8

parameters.name: context

param_schema.title: Context
param_schema.description: Number of frames to condition on (default: max of <length> or 32). max for motion module v1 is 24

parameters.description: Number of frames to condition on (default: max of <length> or 32). max for motion module v1 is 24

parameters.name: clip_skip

param_schema.title: Clip Skip
param_schema.description: Skip the last N-1 layers of the CLIP text encoder (lower values follow prompt more closely)

parameters.description: Skip the last N-1 layers of the CLIP text encoder (lower values follow prompt more closely)

parameters.name: base_model

param_schema.description: Choose the base model for animation generation. If 'CUSTOM' is selected, provide a custom model URL in the next parameter

parameters.description: Choose the base model for animation generation. If 'CUSTOM' is selected, provide a custom model URL in the next parameter

parameters.name: prompt_map
parameters.default: 0: ship steadily moving,((waves crashing against the ship:1.0)) | 32: (((lightning strikes))), distant thunder, ship rocked by waves | 64: ship silhouette,(((heavy rain))),wind howling, waves rising higher | 96: ship navigating through the storm, rain easing off

param_schema.title: Prompt Map
param_schema.default: 0: ship steadily moving,((waves crashing against the ship:1.0)) | 32: (((lightning strikes))), distant thunder, ship rocked by waves | 64: ship silhouette,(((heavy rain))),wind howling, waves rising higher | 96: ship navigating through the storm, rain easing off
param_schema.description: Prompt for changes in animation. Provide 'frame number : prompt at this frame', separate different prompts with '|'. Make sure the frame number does not exceed the length of video (frames)

parameters.description: Prompt for changes in animation. Provide 'frame number : prompt at this frame', separate different prompts with '|'. Make sure the frame number does not exceed the length of video (frames)

parameters.name: head_prompt
parameters.default: masterpiece, best quality, a haunting and detailed depiction of a ship at sea, battered by waves, ominous,((dark clouds:1.3)),distant lightning, rough seas, rain, silhouette of the ship against the stormy sky

param_schema.title: Head Prompt
param_schema.default: masterpiece, best quality, a haunting and detailed depiction of a ship at sea, battered by waves, ominous,((dark clouds:1.3)),distant lightning, rough seas, rain, silhouette of the ship against the stormy sky
param_schema.description: Primary animation prompt. If a prompt map is provided, this will be prefixed at the start of every individual prompt in the map

parameters.description: Primary animation prompt. If a prompt map is provided, this will be prefixed at the start of every individual prompt in the map

parameters.name: tail_prompt
parameters.default: dark horizon, flashes of lightning illuminating the ship, sailors working hard, ship's lanterns flickering, eerie, mysterious, sails flapping loudly, stormy atmosphere

param_schema.title: Tail Prompt
param_schema.default: dark horizon, flashes of lightning illuminating the ship, sailors working hard, ship's lanterns flickering, eerie, mysterious, sails flapping loudly, stormy atmosphere
param_schema.description: Additional prompt that will be appended at the end of the main prompt or individual prompts in the map

parameters.description: Additional prompt that will be appended at the end of the main prompt or individual prompts in the map

parameters.name: output_format

param_schema.description: Output format of the video. Can be 'mp4' or 'gif'

parameters.description: Output format of the video. Can be 'mp4' or 'gif'

parameters.name: guidance_scale

param_schema.title: Guidance Scale
param_schema.description: Guidance Scale. How closely do we want to adhere to the prompt and its contents

parameters.description: Guidance Scale. How closely do we want to adhere to the prompt and its contents

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.default: (worst quality, low quality:1.4), black and white, b&w, sunny, clear skies, calm seas, beach, daytime, ((bright colors)), cartoonish, modern ships, sketchy, unfinished, modern buildings, trees, island

param_schema.title: Negative Prompt
param_schema.default: (worst quality, low quality:1.4), black and white, b&w, sunny, clear skies, calm seas, beach, daytime, ((bright colors)), cartoonish, modern ships, sketchy, unfinished, modern buildings, trees, island

parameters.name: prompt_fixed_ratio

param_schema.title: Prompt Fixed Ratio
param_schema.description: Defines the ratio of adherence to the fixed part of the prompt versus the dynamic part (from prompt map). Value should be between 0 (only dynamic) to 1 (only fixed).

parameters.description: Defines the ratio of adherence to the fixed part of the prompt versus the dynamic part (from prompt map). Value should be between 0 (only dynamic) to 1 (only fixed).

parameters.name: custom_base_model_url

param_schema.title: Custom Base Model Url
param_schema.description: Only used when base model is set to 'CUSTOM'. URL of the custom model to download if 'CUSTOM' is selected in the base model. Only downloads from 'https://civitai.com/api/download/models/' are allowed

parameters.description: Only used when base model is set to 'CUSTOM'. URL of the custom model to download if 'CUSTOM' is selected in the base model. Only downloads from 'https://civitai.com/api/download/models/' are allowed

prompt_map.default: 0: ship steadily moving,((waves crashing against the ship:1.0)) | 32: (((lightning strikes))), distant thunder, ship rocked by waves | 64: ship silhouette,(((heavy rain))),wind howling, waves rising higher | 96: ship navigating through the storm, rain easing off
prompt_map.description: Prompt for changes in animation. Provide 'frame number : prompt at this frame', separate different prompts with '|'. Make sure the frame number does not exceed the length of video (frames)

head_prompt.title: Head Prompt
head_prompt.default: masterpiece, best quality, a haunting and detailed depiction of a ship at sea, battered by waves, ominous,((dark clouds:1.3)),distant lightning, rough seas, rain, silhouette of the ship against the stormy sky

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.default: (worst quality, low quality:1.4), black and white, b&w, sunny, clear skies, calm seas, beach, daytime, ((bright colors)), cartoonish, modern ships, sketchy, unfinished, modern buildings, trees, island

prompt_fixed_ratio.description: Defines the ratio of adherence to the fixed part of the prompt versus the dynamic part (from prompt map). Value should be between 0 (only dynamic) to 1 (only fixed).

custom_base_model_url.title: Custom Base Model Url
custom_base_model_url.description: Only used when base model is set to 'CUSTOM'. URL of the custom model to download if 'CUSTOM' is selected in the base model. Only downloads from 'https://civitai.com/api/download/models/' are allowed
